verses.verse: And David<WH1732> said<WH559> in his heart,<WH3820> I shall now<WH6258> perish<WH5595> one<WH259> day<WH3117> by the hand<WH3027> of Saul:<WH7586> there is nothing<WH369> better<WH2896> for me than<WH3588> that I should speedily<WH4422> escape<WH4422> into<WH413> the land<WH776> of the Philistines;<WH6430> and Saul<WH7586> shall despair<WH2976> of me, to seek<WH1245> me any more<WH5750> in any<WH3605> coast<WH1366> of Israel:<WH3478> so shall I escape<WH4422> out of his hand.<WH3027>

And David<WH1732> arose,<WH6965> and he passed<WH5674> over<WH5674> with the six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> that were with him to Achish,<WH397> the son<WH1121> of Maoch,<WH4582> king<WH4428> of Gath.<WH1661>

And it was told<WH5046> Saul<WH7586> that David<WH1732> was fled<WH1272> to Gath:<WH1661> and he sought<WH1245> no<WH3808> more<WH3254> again<WH3254> for him.

And David<WH1732> said<WH559> to Achish,<WH397> If<WH518> I have now<WH4994> found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in your eyes,<WH5869> let them give<WH5414> me a place<WH4725> in some<WH259> town<WH5892> in the country,<WH7704> that I may dwell<WH3427> there:<WH8033> for why<WH4100> should your servant<WH5650> dwell<WH3427> in the royal<WH4467> city<WH5892> with you?
Then Achish<WH397> gave<WH5414> him Ziklag<WH6860> that day:<WH3117> why<WH3651> Ziklag<WH6860> pertains<WH1961> to the kings<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> to this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>
And the time<WH4557> <WH3117> that David<WH1732> dwelled<WH3427> in the country<WH7704> of the Philistines<WH6430> was a full<WH3117> year and four<WH702> months.<WH2320>

And David<WH1732> and his men<WH582> went<WH5927> up, and invaded<WH6584> the Geshurites,<WH1651> and the Gezrites,<WH1511> and the Amalekites:<WH6003> for those<WH2007> nations were of old<WH5769> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land,<WH776> as you go<WH935> to Shur,<WH7793> even to the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

And David<WH1732> smote<WH5221> the land,<WH776> and left neither<WH3808> man<WH376> nor woman<WH802> alive,<WH2421> and took<WH3947> away the sheep,<WH6629> and the oxen,<WH1241> and the asses,<WH2543> and the camels,<WH1581> and the apparel,<WH899> and returned,<WH7725> and came<WH935> to Achish.<WH397>

And Achish<WH397> said,<WH559> Where<WH413> have you made a road<WH6584> to day?<WH3117> And David<WH1732> said,<WH559> Against<WH5921> the south<WH5045> of Judah,<WH3063> and against<WH5921> the south<WH5045> of the Jerahmeelites,<WH3397> and against<WH413> the south<WH5045> of the Kenites.<WH7017>

And David<WH1732> saved<WH2421> neither<WH3808> man<WH376> nor woman<WH802> alive,<WH2421> to bring<WH935> tidings to Gath,<WH1661> saying,<WH559> Lest<WH6435> they should tell<WH5046> on<WH5921> us, saying,<WH559> So<WH3541> did<WH6213> David,<WH1732> and so<WH3541> will be his manner<WH3541> all<WH3605> the while<WH3117> he dwells<WH3427> in the country<WH7704> of the Philistines.<WH6430>
And Achish<WH397> believed<WH539> David,<WH1732> saying,<WH559> He has made his people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> utterly to abhor<WH887> him; therefore he shall be my servant<WH5650> for ever.<WH5769>
